title: I've Become Friendly With His Wife
itunes:title: I've Become Friendly With His Wife
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 27 year old single female and I just moved to my own place and started a new job. I like my job and I have a few associates that I hang out with after work. There’s one guy that I’m the closest with. He’s 47 and married but unhappy at home. We created a bond and we could tell each other anything, without judgment. The first time we made love, he made me feel like a princess.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
